attributes.action: Prime minister must resign as prime minister and as MP
attributes.background: We want prime minister to resign as prime minister and as MP Theresa May  to resign, after disgracing Britain in front of the entire world. She should not be prime minister as she blacks trump in Muslim ban

rejection.details:
The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
